# Theater (Building)
## Overview
**Theater**

**Create** 41 Goods, 2 Influence, 46 Labor (1,800 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Auditorium (Room)|Auditorium]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Secret Room (Room)|Secret Room]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]], 1 [[Storefront (Room)|Storefront]]

A venue for entertainment such as plays, operas, and concerts.
